name: Hans Christian Andersen
description: Local police officer, skeptical of supernatural claims
look: Stern face, crisp uniform, always carries a notepad

name: Karen Blixen
description: Retired farmer who knows all the local gossip
look: Wrinkled face, overalls, always chewing on a piece of straw

name: Niels Bohr
description: Retired farmer who knows all the local gossip
look: Wrinkled face, overalls, always chewing on a piece of straw

name: Sarah the Librarian
description: Quiet librarian who saw something strange late one night
look: Glasses, cardigan, always carrying a thick book

name: Dr. Eliza Thompson
description: Local veterinarian with knowledge of strange animal behavior
look: Lab coat, stethoscope, always slightly disheveled

name: Tommy the Paperboy
description: Young boy who delivers newspapers and overhears things
look: Freckles, baseball cap, always on his bike
